main event: A bright light was observed descending at an angle above Caledonia, Ontario, on October 31, 1958.
interesting points: The object was at an estimated altitude of 1000 feet and diminished in brightness as it descended,The observation lasted for about 10 minutes,No sound was heard until the object began to descend, when a slight swishing noise was noted,The witness was convinced it was not an aircraft or balloon,The witness could not explain the sighting after it went behind trees.
